verses.roman:
samyak-sāra vāsanā kṛṣṇera rāsa-līlā
rāsa-līlā-vāsanāte rādhikā śṛṅkhalā

synonyms: samyak-sāra—the complete and essential; vāsanā—desire; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; rāsa-līlā—the dancing in the rāsa-līlā; rāsa-līlā-vāsanāte—in the desire to dance the rāsa dance; rādhikā—Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; śṛṅkhalā—the medium of bondage.
translation: "Lord Kṛṣṇa's desire in the rāsa-līlā circle is perfectly complete, but Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī is the binding link in that desire.
